description:
TWO BONUS LECTURES added June 12 2015

5 NEW LECTURES added March 10 2015

This is a 'learn as you paint' and 'paint along with me' workshop, and do you know, every time I paint this picture I sell it. It's atmospheric, it reminds people of their holidays in warmer climates and it could be anywhere. So why not do that your self?

No fancy introductions just get stuck in straight away and produce a finished painting as you learn how to use watercolour paints.

Watch over 1.5 hours of video, (looking over my shoulder) covering every stage, fully narrated by me explaining the techniques as I paint.

It's EASY to follow, stop and start as you wish, relax and enjoy working as and when it suits you and at your own pace.

At any time you can post questions for any advice and also for feedback on your finished painting.

There are also plenty additional notes, professional tips, and extra tuition notes which you can download to build you own 'theory folder'. I will also be adding extra lectures over time.

All you have to do is start painting and enjoy it.

If, however, you don't enjoy it and are not happy you can claim a full refund within 30 days. No questions asked.
title: Paint this watercolour in 7 easy steps, just copy me & learn
